name: Keep 'em safe!
description:
This is my entry for the Stay Safe! Game Jam 2020.

Protect those who entrust their lives into you. Keeping them alive will boost your highscore if they survive entire days ;)

Find and collect food to regain health points.

Credits
Art: Unity Asset Store or self-made
Sounds and Music: Blendwave, Bfxr, UnityAssetStore or self-made
Animations: Mixamo or self-made
